name: Mission San Luis Obispo de Tolosa
desc: A historic Spanish mission offering tours, gardens, and cultural exhibits.

name: Madonna Inn
desc: A famous inn with uniquely themed rooms and pink decor.

name: San Luis Obispo Children's Museum
desc: Interactive exhibits for kids, encouraging learning through play.

name: Sunset Drive-In
desc: A classic drive-in theater showing double features nightly.

name: Bishop Peak
desc: Popular hiking trail with panoramic views of San Luis Obispo.

name: Avila Valley Barn
desc: A charming farm stand with produce, animals, and baked goods.

name: Fremont Theater
desc: An art deco movie theater hosting film screenings and events.

name: Performing Arts Center San Luis Obispo
desc: Venue for concerts, performances, and community events.
